articles.description: A first major final between Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner always promised to deliver - but few expected it to reach the heights that it did.
articles.title: French Open 2025 final: Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner thriller proves rivalry here to stay

articles.title: Transfer news latest: Updates on Bellingham, Cherki, Ait-Nouri and others

articles.title: Zander Fagerson: Scotland prop ruled out of British & Irish Lions tour

articles.description: England continue their dominance over West Indies as a four-wicket win in the second T20 at Bristol seals the series with a game to spare.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Jos Buttler top-scores in chase of 197 to win second T20 at Bristol and seal series victory

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she feels "wary" when she goes out and it has been "difficult" to move on after social media abuse and being stalked.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu on feeling 'wary', coaching change and Queen's 2025

articles.description: LAFC striker Jeremy Ebobisse voices his support for a fan protest against US president Donald Trump's deportation policies.
articles.title: Los Angeles FC striker Jeremy Ebobisse voices support for fan protests against Donald Trump's deportation policies

articles.description: Teenage Strasbourg defender Mamadou Sarr signs an eight-year contract at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Mamadou Sarr: Chelsea sign defender from Strasbourg for £12m

articles.description: Beau Webster has trained as a mortgage broker and is on a honeymoon of sorts - now he's preparing for the World Test Championship final, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Beau Webster: Australia all-rounder on 'honeymoon' and World Test Championship final

articles.description: Wales face Belgium on Monday, renewing a rivalry which has defined the ups and downs of their respective golden generations.
articles.title: 2026 World Cup: Why Belgium came to dread 'bogey team' Wales
